result.eng: There were more than twenty people there.
result.ga: Bhí breis is fiche duine ann
result.orig: Bhí breis is fiche duine ann
result.html: Bhí breis is fiche duine annThere were more than twenty people there.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí breis is fiċe duine annThere were more than twenty people there.

result.eng: He composed more than ten operas.
result.ga: Chum sé breis is deich gceoldráma
result.orig: Chum sé breis is deich gceoldráma
result.html: Chum sé breis is deich gceoldrámaHe composed more than ten operas.
result.ponchtml: Ċum sé breis is deiċ gceoldrámaHe composed more than ten operas.

result.html: Cuireadh mhoill bhreise airHe was delayed even further.
result.ponchtml: Cuireaḋ ṁoill ḃreise airHe was delayed even further.

result.html: Tá lá breise uaimI need an extra day.
result.ponchtml: Tá lá breise uaimI need an extra day.

result.eng: If you are not warm enough, I have a spare coat for you.
result.ga: Mura bhfuil tú te go leor tá cóta breise agam duit
result.orig: Mura bhfuil tú te go leor tá cóta breise agam duit
result.html: Mura bhfuil tú te go leor tá cóta breise agam duitIf you are not warm enough, I have a spare coat for you.
result.ponchtml: Mura ḃfuil tú te go leor tá cóta breise agam duitIf you are not warm enough, I have a spare coat for you.

result.ga: Tá breis is mo dhóthain agam
result.orig: Tá breis is mo dhóthain agam
result.html: Tá breis is mo dhóthain agamI have more than enough.
result.ponchtml: Tá breis is mo ḋóṫain agamI have more than enough.

result.eng: The affair was main news in the established media for over a week.
result.ga: Bhí an cás ina phríomhscéal ag na meáin fhadbhunaithe ar feadh breis is seachtaine
result.orig: Bhí an cás ina phríomhscéal ag na meáin fhadbhunaithe ar feadh breis is seachtaine
result.html: Bhí an cás ina phríomhscéal ag na meáin fhadbhunaithe ar feadh breis is seachtaineThe affair was main news in the established media for over a week.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an cás ina ṗríoṁscéal ag na meáin ḟadḃunaiṫe ar feaḋ breis is seaċtaineThe affair was main news in the established media for over a week.
